top_comment.text:
The driver has a big influence on a trucks’ fuel consumption. Learn about 
the benefits of Dynafleet, Truck's Anatomy: http://tiny.cc/ta3-3﻿
top_comment.author: Volvo Trucks

comments.text:
+mark blizzard  The united states transportation department has gotten rid 
of these trucks over the past 20 years, these are called "cab over engine" 
trucks, and the reason being, they aren't as safe as the regular trucks you 
see nowadays on the highways, Most accidents in the past involving these 
trucks would end up on the truck driver losing their life Because of how 
close the drivers are to the windshield.
comments.author: drumskas

comments.text:
Hi Mark... The Volvo FH is not offered in North America. Significant 
differences in overall length and weight requirements are one reason why 
conventional models are preferred by the North American heavy-duty market.
comments.author: Volvo Trucks

comments.text:
Volvo trucks have gotten quite big in the US over the last 15 years. Will a 
version like this be available in the states?
comments.author: mark blizzard

top_comment.text:
another big fuelsaving is not driving at all, looking at 2-3 days downtime 
on my brand new FM thats called back for upgrades so little fuel used those 
days at least.
not making any money either though..﻿
top_comment.author: sisutrucks

comments.text:
+sisutrucks We are very sorry to hear about this issue. If things do not 
dissolve, send us a direct message telling us your story, including your 
contact information and your truck information, so that we can look further 
into this matter. Thank you!

This is Trucks' Anatomy.

Fuel accounts for roughly one third
of the total operating costs
in the long-haul business.

In this episode of Trucks' Anatomy,
we will focus on fuel efficiency

and how Volvo Trucks'
fleet management system Dynafleet

can be used to ensure
that every drop counts.

A number of factors
can affect a truck's fuel consumption,

including tyre pressure, weight,
axle alignment, weather conditions

and the overall condition
of the vehicle.

However, one of the biggest factors
